#summary Provides an Action to allow you to collapse (not quite) everything
[http://www.rorybecker.me.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/DX_CustomCollapse/ http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Download.png]      [http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/InstallInstructions  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/InstallHelp.png]
[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/Feedback  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Feedback.png]

=== Introduction ===

Provides an action "Custom Collapse", which you can [http://rorybecker.blogspot.com/2009/08/how-to-bind-key-in-coderush.html bind to a key]. This currently collapses everything in your file which is not a namespace, class, structure or region.

Future plans include an options page to let you specify exactly wchi types of element are collapsed.

=== Installation ===

Installation instructions can be found on the InstallInstructions page.

=== Download === 
Primary download is http://www.rorybecker.me.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/DX_CustomCollapse
=== Usage ===

 * [http://rorybecker.blogspot.com/2009/08/how-to-bind-key-in-coderush.html Bind to a key] to the "Custom Collapse" action
 * Invoke the action whilst in a codefile.
